title: Keycap Number Sign
description: A hash key, sometimes referred to as a pound key in the United States. Most commonly used online to make a hashtag (or hash flag) on social media sites.
apple_vendor_description: The number sign, or pound symbol, on Apple devices is rendered with a bold, geometric presence, featuring a distinct dark gray keycap with crisp, white lettering. Its smooth, rounded edges and subtle 3D shading give it a tactile feel, as if pressed from a real keyboard. This emoji on Apple devices is commonly used to denote hashtags, indicate a sequence or order, or in digital contexts as a placeholder for a number.
